name: Through the waves to the never.
name_original: Through the waves to the never.
description:
Your ship will soon be destroyed.  What will you do ? Fulfill your destiny ?  Or watch another time your kingdom falling appart ?

Through the waves to the never was made during the Splash Game Jam 2017.  The theme was rotation but I guess I was most inspired by all the water around me.

To play you just have to used keyboard arrows.  Dialog will be launched automatically when you move to character. There is three different endings, so try to explore the ship in a different order to get all the stories behind your character.

Credit

Made by Damien Chouchen

With Bitsy a very simple tool make game. You can check it here : http://ledoux.io/bitsy/editor.html

Thanks for playing :)
